creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: candlesticks, set of four; fluted columns with Ionic capitals rest on square outward tapering bases, ornamented with two   rows of nulls, or gadroons. Excellent example of how classical revival, fostered by the Adams brothers, influenced the minor arts.
title: Candlestick, one of four
